name: MetalGreymon_(Virus)_X
description: MetalGreymon (Virus) X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . Each of its mechanized portions have been updated; in particular, its "Alterous" ( Lat : The Others), the enhanced and remodeled "Trident Arm" on its left arm, is capable of switching between "Blitz Mode" and "Blast Mode". Also, it has been equipped with an energy booster that, at its maximum output, lets it exceed the speed of sound .
